summary: Aspiring digital marketer with a strong foundation in content marketing (email, mobile app, web), proficient in A/B testing methods to refine campaigns for optimal performance and ROI. Proficient in KPI reporting to track monthly campaign performance across lead teams and digital channels, ensuring data-driven insights for optimization.

profile_positions.description:
• Utilized analytics tools to monitor key performance indicators and identify areas for improvement.
• Utilized Excel and Sprinklr to analyze campaign performances across channels and produce reports for senior management.
• Partnering with global and EMEA stakeholders to align on strategies and key initiatives of outgoing campaigns.
• Analysed content metrics to optimize content briefs for better results.
• Monitored content deliverables to ensure quality standards and business expectations before the content reached the consumers.
• Fostered internal communication with cross-marketing teams to ensure clear content deliverables and business expectations.
• Maintained strong relationships with internal stakeholders and external partners for smooth content delivery.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure campaign success and alignment with business goals.
• Content authoring (CMS) and testing for Nike e-mail campaigns, App, NTC Live, Nike.com and various lifestyle categories.
• Performing QA's and  A/B tests on Nike channels for new product tools, creatives and services to develop the consumer journey.
• Ensured quality authoring for SU21/2; FA21/2; HO21/2 campaigns 
• Training and monitoring the working process of newcomers
profile_positions.title: Digital Content Specialist

profile_positions.description:
• Authoring for Nike.com - building landing pages, global navigation and in-wall contents.
• Performing QA's for the upcoming content to ensure everything is set to go live accordingly.
• Collaborating successfully across multiple channels (email, Nike app, Nike.com, Jordan).
• Checking on a daily basis the Sprinklr shells and CMS threads for technical issues in order to solve production-related challenges.
profile_positions.title: Digital Content Intern

profile_positions.description:
Communication Intern for East:

• Creating internal marketing campaigns.
• Gathering key coverage from territories and creating the weekly presentation that is sent out to the distributor's team.
• Attending the weekly EMEA comms team call, territory comms team call and the category comms calls to filter and highlight priority information for market leads.
• Support on strategy & consolidate market information into one East deck.
• Supporting with media assets and collecting relevant information to develop and distribute the East bi-weekly newsletter to the East territory (COVID-19 innovation). 

One-off projects: 

• FIFA20 (COVID-19 innovation) - Support on both planning and execution of the internal football tournament for Nike employees (creating media assets to distribute the messaging e.g visual email and videos).
• 10R - Helping across both planning and execution of the 10-year celebration event at Nike EHQ for the Brazilian football player Ronaldinho.
profile_positions.title: Communication Intern

profile_positions.description: Graduate of Media and Entertainment Management course at NHL Stenden University of Applied. During this course, I have gained theoretical knowledge as well as practical experience within the following sectors: branding and communication, marketing and research, operations and production studies, managerial, media relations, and cultural studies as well as strategic management studies. All of these main study domains prepare me to enter the world of marketing business and brand planning.
profile_positions.title: Student

volunteer_experiences.description: I contributed to the process of coming up with ideas for our news articles regarding the city Leeuwarden and I've also created content for the organisation (videos).

I've joined this student organisation in order to broaden and further develop my editing skills as well as communication skills. Some of my responsibilities were as followed:
*Responsible for the designing and editing content for the organisation (posters, video). 
*Creating different events such as Talent Night, Carnival Evening, Debate Session (on various media issues) and so on.

Responsible for managing social media accounts (Snapchat, Instagram and Facebook) and creating daily content. Moreover, promoting our events through all of our social media by creating interactive stories or videos.
